price: 太阳不得追及月亮，黑夜也不得超越白昼，各在一个轨道上浮游着。
arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَكُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā al-shamsu yanbaghī lahā an tud'rika al-qamara walā al-laylu sābiqu al-nahāri wakullun fī falakin yasbaḥūna
